fn.p: Sheng-I Chen conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper, approved the final draft, research grant and project management.
Chia-Yuan Wu analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools.
Yu-Hsuan Wu and Min-Wei Hsieh performed the experiments, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, prepared figures and/or tables, authored or reviewed drafts of the paper.
